body.p: Gov Bramlette Sir if you want any more Proof then this Gen Shackelford knowes me and knowes that I was in this Regiment and Served as Second Lieut in comp H, of the 25th Ky Infentry at Donnelson & at Shilow after which I Rezined and went in too the 8th Ky Cav for twelve months.
If you can grant me permission just write me word wether to sweare them in or not as I recruit them or not,
If Permission is granted I would like too Rendevooze foen at Hopkinsville & Madinsonville Ky these two plases are very good plases to get men, I think I can get them in ^a^ hurrie
You will find becids this a nother letter in closed, which will will give the first of my of you
Pleas approve these fiew bad written Requests
